JOHN 12.14 bigat þan Iesus asilu, jah gasat ana ina, swaswe ist gameliþ:
JOHN 12.15 ni ogs þus,
dauhtar Sion, sai, þiudans þeins qimiþ sitands ana fulin asilaus.
JOHN 12.16 þat-uþ-þan ni kunþedun siponjos is frumist;
ak biþe gasweraiþs was Iesus, þanuh gamundedun þatei þata was du þamma gameliþ, jah þata gatawidedun imma.
JOHN 12.17 weitwodida þan so managei, sei was miþ imma, þan Lazaru wopida us hlaiwa jah urraisida ina us dauþaim.
JOHN 12.18 duþþe iddjedun gamotjan imma managei, unte hausidedun ei gatawidedi þo taikn.
JOHN 12.19 þanuh þai Fareisaieis qeþun du sis misso:
saiƕiþ þatei ni boteiþ waiht;
sai, so manaseds afar imma galaiþ.
JOHN 12.20 wesun-uþ-þan sumai þiudo þize urrinnandane, ei inwiteina in þizai dulþai.
JOHN 12.21 þai atiddjedun du Filippau, þamma fram Beþsaeida Galeilaie, jah bedun ina qiþandans:
frauja, wileima Iesu gasaiƕan.
JOHN 12.22 gaggiþ Filippus jah qiþiþ du Andraiin, jah aftra Andraias jah Filippus qeþun du Iesua.
JOHN 12.23 iþ Iesus andhof im qiþands:
qam ƕeila ei sweraidau sunus mans.
JOHN 12.24 amen amen qiþa izwis:
nibai kaurno ƕaiteis gadriusando in airþa gaswiltiþ, silbo ainata aflifniþ:
iþ jabai gaswiltiþ, manag akran bairiþ.
JOHN 12.25 saei frijoþ saiwala seina, fraqisteiþ izai, jah saei fiaiþ saiwala seina in þamma fairƕau, in libainai aiweinon bairgiþ izai.
JOHN 12.26 jabai mis ƕas andbahtjai, mik laistjai:
jah þarei im ik, þaruh sa andbahts meins wisan habaiþ;
jah jabai ƕas mis andbahtiþ, sweraiþ ina atta.
JOHN 12.27 nu saiwala meina gadrobnoda, jah ƕa qiþau?
atta, nasei mik us þizai ƕeilai.
akei duþþe qam in þizai ƕeilai.
JOHN 12.28 atta, hauhei namo þeinata!
qam þan stibna us himina:
jah hauhida jah aftra hauhja.
JOHN 12.29 managei þan sei stoþ gahausjandei, qeþun þeiƕon wairþan;
sumaih qeþun:
aggilus du imma rodida.
JOHN 12.30 andhof Iesus jah qaþ:
ni in meina so stibna warþ, ak in izwara.
JOHN 12.31 nu staua ist þizai manasedai,
nu sa reiks þis fairƕaus uswairpada ut.
JOHN 12.32 jah ik jabai ushauhjada af airþai, alla atþinsa du mis.
JOHN 12.33 þat-uþ-þan qaþ bandwjands ƕileikamma dauþau skulda gadauþnan.
JOHN 12.34 andhof imma so managei:
weis hausidedum ana witoda þatei Xristus sijai du aiwa;
jah ƕaiwa þu qiþis þatei skulds ist ushauhjan sa sunus mans?
ƕas ist sa sunus mans?
JOHN 12.35 qaþ þan du im Iesus:
nauh leitil mel liuhaþ in izwis ist.
gaggiþ þande liuhaþ habaiþ, ei riqiz izwis ni gafahai;
jah saei gaggiþ in riqiza, ni wait ƕaþ gaggiþ.
JOHN 12.36 þande liuhaþ habaiþ, galaubeiþ du liuhada, ei sunjus liuhadis wairþaiþ.
þata rodida Iesus, jah galaiþ jah gafalh sik faura im.
JOHN 12.37 swa filu imma taikne gataujandin in andwairþja ize, ni galaubidedun imma, JOHN 12.38 ei þata waurd Esaeiins praufetaus usfullnodedi þatei qaþ:
frauja, ƕas galaubida hauseinai unsarai?
jah arms fraujins ƕamma andhuliþs warþ?
JOHN 12.39 duþþe ni mahtedun galaubjan; unte aftra qaþ Esaeias:
JOHN 12.40 gablindida ize augona jah gadaubida ize hairtona, ei ni gaumidedeina augam jah froþeina hairtin jah gawandidedeina jah ganasidedjau ins.
JOHN 12.41 þata qaþ Esaeias, þan saƕ wulþu is jah rodida bi ina.
JOHN 12.42 þanuh þan sweþauh jah us þaim reikam managai galaubidedun du imma, akei faura Fareisaium ni andhaihaitun, ei us swnagogei ni uswaurpanai waurþeina.
JOHN 12.43 frijodedun auk mais hauhein manniska þau hauhein gudis.
JOHN 12.44 iþ Iesus hropida jah qaþ:
saei galaubeiþ du mis ni galaubeiþ du mis, ak du þamma sandjandin mik.
JOHN 12.45 jah saei saiƕiþ mik, saiƕiþ þana sandjandan mik.
JOHN 12.46 ik liuhad in þamma fairƕau qam, ei ƕazuh saei galaubjai du mis, in riqiza ni wisai.
